nodes.text: An army was a faction of troops and soldiers who were dedicated to a central cause. Major armies throughout galactic history included the Gungan Grand Army, the Trade Federation Droid Army, the Grand Army of the Republic, the Separatist Droid Army, the Imperial Army, the Alliance Army, the New Republic army, the First Order army, the Resistance army, and the Sith Eternal army.
In order to invade a planet, a group could organize an invasion army and use landing craft to move them to the surface.
